title: On Afghanistan-Pakistan border, some Afghans want to flee, others to return home
content:
1. On Afghanistan-Pakistan border, some Afghans want to flee, others to return home  The Washington Post
  2. The U.S. military is gone. How are Afghans going to get out of Afghanistan now?  NBC News
  3. Taliban celebrates victory as last US troops leave Afghanistan  Al Jazeera English
  4. Keep us out of your tiffs, Taliban tell India, Pakistan  Pajhwok Afghan News
  5. The great obfuscation: Don’t fall for these 3 myths on Afghanistan  The Times of India Blog
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アフガニスタンとパキスタンの国境では、逃亡を望むアフガニスタン人と帰国を望むアフガニスタン人が混在しています。
在阿富汗和巴基斯坦边境，一些阿富汗人希望逃离，另一些人则希望返回家园
在阿富汗和巴基斯坦邊境，一些阿富汗人希望逃離，另一些人則希望返回家園
